question.title: Shortest Path in a Hidden Grid
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Robot Room Cleaner", "titleSlug": "robot-room-cleaner", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Minimum Path Cost in a Hidden Grid", "titleSlug": "minimum-path-cost-in-a-hidden-grid", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: The grid is at a maximum 500 x 500, so it is clever to assume that the robot's initial cell is grid[501][501]
Run a DFS from the robot's position to make sure that you can reach the target, otherwise you should return -1.
Now that you are sure you can reach the target, run BFS to find the shortest path.
